name.baseName: Multi-Si PV cell production ; Multi-Si PV cell, efficiency of the PV cell 12.7% ; Integrated method

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: In this study, 1 kWp multi-Si PV cell production was selected as the functional unit.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The 2010 onsite data (i.e., raw material, energy, storage, direct emissions, and waste disposal) for multi-Si, solar glass, PV wafer, and cell production in Zhejiang Province, China, were used in this study
本研究使用了2010年浙江省多晶硅、太阳能电池玻璃、光伏晶圆和电池生产的现场数据(即原材料、能源、存储、直接排放和废弃物处理)

technology.technologicalApplicability: The technical usage of the multi-Si PV cell production data set is to understand and apply the environmental implications of manufacturing multicrystalline silicon photovoltaic cells, which are often used in solar panels for converting sunlight into electricity. These cells, with an efficiency rated at 12.7%, are pertinent to solar power installations where economy and moderate efficiency are important considerations.
多晶硅光伏电池生产数据集的技术应用是理解和运用制造多晶硅光伏电池的环境影响，这些电池通常用于太阳能板中，将阳光转换为电能。这些电池的效率为12.7％，适用于对经济性和适度效率具有重要考虑的太阳能发电安装。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: This study aims to identify the environmental effects associated with photovoltaic (PV) cell made up of multicrystalline silicon (multi-Si) in China by life cycle assessment.
本研究旨在通过生命周期评估，探讨中国多晶硅光伏电池的环境效应。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The 2010 onsite data (i.e., raw material, energy, storage, direct emissions, and waste disposal) for multi-Si, solar glass, PV wafer, and cell production in Zhejiang Province, China, were used in this study
本研究使用了2010年浙江省多晶硅、太阳能玻璃、光伏晶圆和电池生产的现场数据(即原材料、能源、存储、直接排放和废弃物处理)

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Hong, J., Chen, W., Qi, C., Ye, L. & Xu, C. Life cycle assessment of multicrystalline silicon photovoltaic cell production in China. Solar Energy 133, 283–293 (2016).
Hong, J., Chen, W., Qi, C., Ye, L. & Xu, C. Life cycle assessment of multicrystalline silicon photovoltaic cell production in China. Solar Energy 133, 283–293 (2016).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data should adhere to methodological guidelines that ensure the inclusion of all relevant processes in the lifecycle assessment of multi-Si PV cell production. Special attention should be paid to system boundaries, assumptions regarding the functional unit of 1 kWp of multi-Si PV cell production, the integration of direct emissions, and waste management practices. Users must also be mindful that this data is region-specific to Zhejiang Province and reflects the year 2010, which may require adjustment for other regions or temporal scenarios.
使用此数据的用户应遵守确保在多晶硅光伏电池生产的生命周期评估中包括所有相关过程的方法论指南。应特别关注系统边界、关于1 kWp多晶硅光伏电池生产功能单元的假设、直接排放的整合以及废物管理实践。用户还必须注意，该数据是浙江省特定的，并反映了2010年的情况，可能需要针对其他地区或时间情景进行调整。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Very fine milled silica sand d50 = 20 micrometer

multi-Si PV cell(Multi-Si PV cell production)

waste incineration of municipal solid waste (MSW)
